translation.AffiliateReferralDescription: Receive $25 welcome bonus cash every time you refer a new player to GameChampions! Use the link below and your friend will get $5.00 Bonus with their 1st deposit.
translation.AffiliateReferralFinePrint: * To qualify, invited friends must click your personal referral link, be a new player and first time depositor.
translation.AffiliateReferralFinePrintSupport: If you have any questions about this program email help@gamechampions.com

translation.BoyMatchAuxillaryStatusCancelledByAdmin: Oops! Customer support refunded this match.
translation.BoyMatchAuxillaryStatusCohortChanged: Oops! A cohort error has occurred, please contact customer support.
translation.BoyMatchAuxillaryStatusMatchNotPlayed15M: Oops! The match was not detected in 15 minutes.
translation.BoyMatchAuxillaryStatusMatchNotPlayed24H: Oops! Match was not played in 24Hrs.
translation.BoyMatchMessageStatus0: Waiting for you to enter the game
translation.BoyMatchMessageStatus1: Make sure to start your game before the timer ends to confirm your bet. If your game is not detected, your bet will be refunded.
translation.BoyMatchMessageStatus2: We'll confirm your results as soon as the match is over. Good luck!
translation.BoyMatchMessageStatus3: Hang tight, we're verifying your results! This could take a few minutes, so why not start another match while you wait?
translation.BoyMatchMessageStatus4LOSS: You lost the challenge, don't get discouraged, learn from your experience and get ready for the next one!
translation.BoyMatchMessageStatus4WON: Congratulations! Your skills have paid off and you won the challenge.
translation.BoyMatchMessageStatus5: If you think there is a problem please contact support.
translation.BoySuspectedFraudBanner: Oops... You cannot play at this time, our risk management is working on generating new prizes for you, please try again later.
translation.BoyVerificationStep1Subtitle: To get started enter your Fortnite username
translation.BoyVerificationStep1Text1: How to find your Fortnite Username?
translation.BoyVerificationStep1Text3: From the lobby, your Fortnite username appears above your Fortnite character.
translation.BoyVerificationStep2EpicIdVerificationSu: Multiple Fortnite accounts exist with this username, select the platform you play on
translation.BoyVerificationStep2Subtitle: Add the GameChampions account as a friend on Fortnite
translation.BoyVerificationStep2Text1: How to add a friend on Fortnite?
translation.BoyVerificationStep2Text3: In the social tab you can add a friend
translation.BoyVerificationStep2Text4: Search for the GameChampions account and add as a friend
translation.BoyVerificationStep2Text5: To be able to connect, your Fortnite account must have PUBLIC GAME STATS = ON
translation.BoyVerificationStep2Text6: Verifying that you have friended the GameChampions account
translation.BoyVerificationStep3Subtitle: Congratulations your account is connected and you are ready to play!
translation.BoyVerificationStep3TextConfirm: Are you friends with the GameChampions account on Fortnite?
translation.BoyWelcomeBonusSubtitle: Connect your game account and get your free cash!

translation.IncognitoText: The opponent is revealed once the match is started
translation.InformationWithdrawMessage: Withdrawals are sent out on a weekly basis on Wednesdays. You will receive your requested amount less the fees charged by the bank. You can also request to receive your funds via gift cards if you want lower fees and a fast cashout
translation.InformationWithdrawSubmittedMessage: The finance team has received your withdrawal request and your funds will be sent to your account on Wednesday. Check your email for confirmation of your withdrawal request. If this is your first withdrawal you may need to complete basic KYC requirements, contact support for more information regarding KYC.

translation.InsufficientFunds: You do not have enough funds to perform this action. Please deposit to continue.

translation.LolVerificationText2: Make sure that you have selected the correct region that your account is located in or your matches will not track properly.
translation.LolVerificationText3: chat with our customer support team to get help setting up your account
translation.LolVerificationText3Confirm: Are you sure you have entered the correct region and the correct summoner name? You will not be able to change this information once its confirmed

translation.MatchDrawMessage: The match finished in a draw
translation.MatchLobbyOpponentSubmittedResult: Your opponent shared the match result. You must report the result before the timer ends, or it will be considered the correct score.
translation.MatchLobbyReportResultAccept: I acknowledge that the result I have entered is correct and I understand that reporting fake results can lead to fines or account termination
translation.MatchLobbyUnderReview: You and your opponent have different results, and our support team needs to determine the real winner. To help us decide, post clear photos showing that you won.
translation.MatchLobbyWaitingForOpponent: Your opponent needs to accept the match
translation.MatchLobbyWaitingOpponentResult: Your opponent hasn't reported the result yet. If they don't enter a result before the timer ends, your result will be automatically verified.
